fields.question_about: When does Roula plan on releasing its application to the public?
fields.answer: At our current rate, we expect it to be released around Q3 2022!

fields.question_about: How much will the application cost when it goes public?
fields.answer: The application will be free! Right now we just are trying to collect funding so that all the features will be working perfectly!

fields.question_about: What are some features that early access users can expect?
fields.answer: There are many ideas still in the air about this. We are thinking of either a special discount code or reward multiplier. This means that you would be receiving more rewards than regular users for a time being!

fields.question_about: Why should we take part in this movement?
fields.answer: We are not trying to force you to download this app, however which apps on the app store pay you for your raw data?

fields.question_about: Where does Roula Merchendice get made?
fields.answer: In our serach of manufactuers we came accross a small buisnness named t-shirts & more. They are a startup from Oregon and have some contracts already with Nike!

fields.question_about: When does Roula plan on releasing thier advertisments to the public
fields.answer: We are currently drafting and creating advertisements around the clock. In a few months, the ads will be flooding the internet!

fields.question_about: Will users of Roula have their online store account?
fields.answer: Each profile will have an independent profile page and the user can choose to be selling, or earning. Depending on the choice the UI will change depending on which option is chosen.
